title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 10 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 10 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Why standest thou afar off, O LORD? why hidest thou thyself in times of trouble?
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你为什么站在远处。在患难的时候，为什么隐藏。

lineList.en: The wicked in his pride doth persecute the poor: let them be taken in the devices that they have imagined.
lineList.cn: 恶人在骄横中，把困苦人追得火急。愿他们陷在自己所设的计谋里。

lineList.en: For the wicked boasteth of his heart's desire, and blesseth the covetous, whom the LORD abhorreth.
lineList.cn: 因为恶人以心愿自夸。贪财的背弃耶和华，并且轻慢他。

lineList.en: The wicked, through the pride of his countenance, will not seek after God: God is not in all his thoughts.
lineList.cn: 恶人面带骄傲，说，耶和华必不追究。他一切所想的，都以为没有神。

lineList.en: His ways are always grievous; thy judgments are far above out of his sight: as for all his enemies, he puffeth at them.
lineList.cn: 凡他所作的，时常稳固。你的审判超过他的眼界。至于他一切的敌人，他都向他们喷气。

lineList.en: He hath said in his heart, I shall not be moved: for I shall never be in adversity.
lineList.cn: 他心里说，我必不动摇，世世代代不遭灾难。

lineList.en: His mouth is full of cursing and deceit and fraud: under his tongue is mischief and vanity.
lineList.cn: 他满口是咒骂，诡诈，欺压。舌底是毒害奸恶。

lineList.en: He sitteth in the lurking places of the villages: in the secret places doth he murder the innocent: his eyes are privily set against the poor.
lineList.cn: 他在村庄埋伏等候。他在隐密处杀害无辜人。他的眼睛窥探无倚无靠的人。

lineList.en: He lieth in wait secretly as a lion in his den: he lieth in wait to catch the poor: he doth catch the poor, when he draweth him into his net.
lineList.cn: 他埋伏在暗地，如狮子蹲在洞中。他埋伏，要掳去困苦人。他拉网，就把困苦人掳去。

lineList.en: He croucheth, and humbleth himself, that the poor may fall by his strong ones.
lineList.cn: 他屈身蹲伏，无倚无靠的人，就倒在他爪牙之下，

lineList.en: He hath said in his heart, God hath forgotten: he hideth his face; he will never see it.
lineList.cn: 他心里说，神竟忘记了。他掩面，永不观看。

lineList.en: Arise, O LORD; O God, lift up thine hand: forget not the humble.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你起来。神阿，求你举手。不要忘记困苦人。

lineList.en: Wherefore doth the wicked contemn God? he hath said in his heart, Thou wilt not require it.
lineList.cn: 恶人为何轻慢神，心里说，你必不追究。

lineList.en: Thou hast seen it; for thou beholdest mischief and spite, to requite it with thy hand: the poor committeth himself unto thee; thou art the helper of the fatherless.
lineList.cn: 其实你已经观看。因为奸恶毒害，你都看见了，为要以手施行报应。无倚无靠的人，把自己交托你。你向来是帮助孤儿的。

lineList.en: Break thou the arm of the wicked and the evil man: seek out his wickedness till thou find none.
lineList.cn: 愿你打断恶人的膀臂。至于坏人，愿你追究他的恶，直到净尽。

lineList.en: The LORD is King for ever and ever: the heathen are perished out of his land.
lineList.cn: 耶和华永永远远为王。外邦人从他的地已经灭绝了。

lineList.en: LORD, thou hast heard the desire of the humble: thou wilt prepare their heart, thou wilt cause thine ear to hear:
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，谦卑人的心愿，你早已知道。你必豫备他们的心，也必侧耳听他们的祈求。

lineList.en: To judge the fatherless and the oppressed, that the man of the earth may no more oppress.
lineList.cn: 为要给孤儿和受欺压的人伸冤，使强横的人不再威吓他们。
